name: Biscuit Challenges
description:
Challenge #1 - custom background button using auto-layout.

The button is resizable only on x-axis (width).


Challenge #2 - Contained resizable doughnut chart.

Also doughnut chart with text which stay on the middle of the arc.


Challenge #3 - Vertical timeline using auto-layout.

The timeline can have the content on either side (left or right).


More info:

https://spectrum.chat/figma/general/design-challenge-for-figma-community~5de06d9a-c6e6-4c64-a10e-836ae5b10ae4
